entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is mentioned as one of the girls who had not been selected and was about to vanish into the side chamber. She is described as a Hogwarts student.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: Cedric Diggory is announced as the Hogwarts champion by Dumbledore. He is described as making his way past Hufflepuff students and heading off toward the chamber behind the teachers' table.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as thinking that 'Disappointed' was a bit of an understatement. He is also the only one who hears Ron's loud outburst.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as saying 'No!' loudly, but his voice is drowned out by the uproar from the next table.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as pulling the third piece of parchment from the Goblet of Fire and announcing Cedric Diggory as the Hogwarts champion.

relationships.description: Harry is the only one who hears Ron's loud outburst, indicating that Harry heard Ron.
Dumbledore announces Cedric Diggory as the Hogwarts champion, indicating a relationship between Dumbledore and Cedric Diggory.
